titles.title: To amend title 28, United States Code, to provide for the appointment of an additional district judge for the District of Idaho.

action.text: Sponsor introductory remarks on measure. (CR E331)
Referred to the House Committee on Judiciary.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Economic and Commercial Law.

bill.summary: 2/16/1993--Introduced. Amends the Federal judicial code to provide for the appointment of an additional district judge for the district of Idaho.
